name.ja: <ruby>蒼<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>救<rt>きゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>天<rt>てん</rt></ruby><ruby>使<rt>し</rt></ruby> ルーア

requirement.en: Reveal 1 Warrior Type monster in your hand:

effect.en: This card's name becomes "Soleil the Skysavior Angel" this turn. Then, send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, you can add 1 "Fusion" from among the cards sent to the Graveyard by this effect to your hand.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
